Text: Six Sigma work must be completed by July LNotesnsf As a reminder work on the Six Sigma CD must be completed by July for all salaried employees Hourly employees are not required to do this work but are given the option if desired If you have not received a CD please see your manager Thanks Dan Managers If you have not received CDs for your department please contact Lourine Saxton ext prior to Friday

Clarification of Six Sigma Requirement LNotesnsf Clarification of Six Sigma Requirement Salaried Exempt Employees It is mandatory for all salaried exempt employees to complete the work on the Siggy CD by July Siggy CD knowledge check will be available after July Salaried Non Exempt Employees Although it is not mandatory for salaried non exempt employees to complete the work on the Siggy CD however we have made the CDs available for your use if you choose to pursue Green Belt Certification Hourly Employees Although it is not mandatory for Hourly Employees to complete the work on the Siggy CD however we have made the CDs available for your use if your choose to pursue Green Belt Certification If you have any questions please contact Lourine Saxton at ext If you have not yet received your Siggy CD please contact your Manager
Six Sigma LNotesnsf DO NOT USE A BALL POINT PEN TO WRITE ON YOUR SIX SIGMA CD IT WILL LEAVE AN IMPRINT ON THE CD AND WILL BE DESTROYED
